milestone: In September 1999, I went to primary school.

highlight: In 3rd grade, I rolled down a hill and injured my right wrist. I was very ill, but I survived.

milestone: In 3rd grade, our school shut down, and we moved to a new school where I met my old friends. They are important to me.

highlight: In 6th grade, I received my first academic award for achieving a good grade in math.

milestone: In July 2005, I graduated from primary school and went to middle school in the same year.

highlight: In 2nd grade, I won an award for painting.

milestone: In 2008, I went to high school.

highlight: In 2nd grade, we organized a student campaign to reject summer and winter holiday homework.

milestone: In Oct 2010, I was 18 years old.
In September 2011, I started attending Inner Mongolia University.

highlight: Near the end of my 1st year in university, I recovered from a severe illness, and I still don't know the cause of it.

milestone: In July 2015, I graduated from IMU and went to Beijing Normal University in the same year.
On October 3rd, 2016, I was 27 years old. Version 28.
In October 2016, I decided to change my major and began studying bioinformatics.
Had my first job as a research assitant in Institute of Microbiology.
On October 3rd, 2019, I turned 28 years old. Version 29.
In October 2019, I quit my job and moved to Yantai to live a jobless life for 9 months, during which time I focused on learning math and computer-related topics.
On May 1st, 2021, I started my second job as a research assistant at Westlake University.
On 3nd October, 2022, I turned 30 years old. Version 31, Circleend.
On 3nd October, 2023, I turned 31 years old. Version 32, Softwind.
On 3nd October, 2024, I turned 32 years old. Version 33, Littlewonder.
On 1st July, 2025, I quite the doctorate project.
On 3nd October, 2025, I turned 33 years old. Version 34, Darkbeam.
